title: Custom.Guitar.Hero.2.with.GH1andGH80s.XBOX360-SL-X
description:
Custom.Guitar.Hero.2.with.GH1andGH80s.XBOX360-SL-X
              

After the positive reception to the first custom Guitar Hero release, SL-X now brings you the original Guitar Hero
and the expansion Guitar Hero: Rocks the 80&#039;s in a single DVD compilation. That&#039;s right, ALL 60 songs from both games&#039;
career paths have been converted for use on the X-Box 360. Due to the editing contstraints of the Guitar Hero II X-Box
360 ISO, these songs are in no particular order based off tiers. We did not bother with the bonus tracks from the original
Guitar Hero and the developers were too lazy to include any bonus tracks on the 80&#039;s disc anyway. All song support all
difficulty levels. All songs include Face-off and Pro Face-off multiplayer modes. All songs from Guitar Hero: Rocks
the 80&#039;s contain bass tracks for multiplayer co-op. Throw out your Playstation 2 and enjoy this hot SL-X release!!!

Tier 1 
The Exies - Hey You Surrender GH 1 E,M,H,X 
Deep Purple - Smoke on the Water Possum Kingdom GH 1 E,M,H,X 
.38 Special - Hold on Loosely Heart-Shaped Box GH 80s E,M,H,X
